Package gw.plugin.document.impl

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseDocumentProductionImpl
    The root implementation of the internal IDocumentProduction implementations.
    BaseExcelDocumentProductionImpl
    Base class for IDocumentProduction implementations which generate Excel documents.
    BaseGosuDocumentProductionImpl
    Base class for IDocumentProduction implementations which generate documents based on Gosu templates (generally text-based formats).
    BaseMailMergeDocumentProductionImpl
    Base class for IDocumentProduction implementations which use Microsoft MailMerge to generate documents (mainly Word and Excel).
    BaseServerSideDocumentProductionImpl
    Abstract base class which performs the basic computation of form field values which are often needed when generating document contents on the server side.
    BaseServerSidePDFDocumentProductionImpl
    Base class for IDocumentProduction implementations which generate PDF documents on the server.
    BaseWordDocumentProductionImpl
    Base class for IDocumentProduction implementations which generate Word documents.
    BFOMergeHandler
    Stock implementation of IPDFMergeHandler.
    DocumentProductionDispatcher
    This class is really an aggregation of the other ICCDocumentProduction implementations.
    DocumentTemplateUtil  
    ExcelDocumentProductionImpl
    CC-Specific implementation of the IDocumentProduction implementation for Microsoft Excel documents.
    GosuDocumentProductionImpl
    CC-Specific implementation of the IDocumentProduction implementation for Gosu-based documents (html, rtf, etc).
    ServerSideExcelDocumentProduction
    Creates an excel document from template using aspose library
    ServerSideMicrosoftLicenseTool
    Created by dandrews on 12/16/2015.
    ServerSidePDFDocumentProductionImpl
    CC-Specific implementation of the IDocumentProduction implementation for Adobe Acrobat-based (pdf) documents.
    ServerSideWordDocumentProduction
    Created by dandrews on 11/13/2015.
    StandardDocumentTemplateSerializer
    The basic implementation of IDocumentTemplateSerializer which converts to and from a basic XML representation.
    WordDocumentProductionImpl
    CC-Specific implementation of the IDocumentProduction implementation for Microsoft Word documents.
    XFDFNode
    User: irabin Date: 9/8/11 Time: 5:01 PM
    XMLDocumentTemplateDescriptor
    An implementation of IDocTemplateDescriptor which is based on an XML file.
